body_html: @soumith, if you encounter such cases in cublas, can you please let us know? It is a bug (and actually all netlib blas descriptions say that for beta=0 output can be uninitialized, so if there are blas libraries behaving differently that's a bug too).

body: @soumith, if you encounter such cases in cublas, can you please let us know? It is a bug (and actually all netlib blas descriptions say that for beta=0 output can be uninitialized, so if there are blas libraries behaving differently that's a bug too).
